titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi:
Our Australian guests – Sergeant Lawrence & the boy Reggie, both from West Australia arrived in the course of the afternoon. We had to leave them to their own devices as we were pledged to dine with the
Murray Smiths, with whom
had come to stay when she went to Court last night

body.p: Ralph & Kitty were there, & the Master of the Temple.
